channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 19:15 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region. Since further messages.
item.description: 游릭 19:15 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region. Since further messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
